alert.note: Alert for Coryell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 7:23PM CDT until April 02 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CORYELL AND NORTHWESTERN BELL COUNTIES... At 723 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Killeen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Fort Hood, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Salado, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Belton Lake, Union Grove, White Hall, Moffat, Owl Creek, Woodland and Flat. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Texas.
